title: Oppenheimer
actors: Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon
description: The story of American scientist, J.Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb

title: Johnwick Chapter4
actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, George Georgiou
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Blue Beetle
actors: Xolo Maridue√±a, Bruna Marquezine, Becky G
description: An alien scarab chooses Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing the recent college graduate with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary powers, forever changing his destiny as he becomes the superhero known as Blue Beetle.

title: The Creator
actors: John David Washington, Madeleine Yuna Voyles, Gemma Chan
description: Against the backdrop of a war between humans and robots with artificial intelligence, a former soldier finds the secret weapon, a robot in the form of a young child.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro, Lily Gladstone
description: When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

title: Animal
actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Bobby Deol
description: A father, who is often away due to work, is unable to comprehend the intensity of his son's fervent love and admiration, which creates conflict between both of them.

title: Fighter
actors: Deepika Padukone, Anil Kapoor, Hrithik Roshan
description: Top IAF aviators come together in the face of imminent danger, to form Air Dragons. FIGHTER unfolds their camaraderie, brotherhood and battles, internal and external.

title: Hanu-Man
actors: Teja Sajja, Amritha Aiyer, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar
description: An imaginary place called Anjanadri where the protagonist gets the powers of Hanuman and fights for Anjanadri.
